repairedDockerfile:
# Use same base as postgres to minimize total size 
FROM debian:wheezy 

RUN apt-get update \
&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python curl \
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
&& curl -f -SL 'https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py' | python

ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 
ADD app /app 
WORKDIR /app 

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

CMD ["python2", "agent.py"]
